issue.title: [CF 1430] TMW Can't Recognize a Named Unit if it contains an Apostrophe?
issue.body:
I still need to test this a bit more but...I can't get TMW to recognize conditions when they specifically point to bosses with apostrophes in their name. This would explain why auras where I specifically point toward Kil'jaeden and Mistress Sassz'ine won't succeed as conditions.

 

Will try going into pugs and changing conditions from naming the units specifically to something like BigWigs-Boss Engaged.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1430 | Raw

comments.body:
Testing in old WOD dungeons (faster than clearing to Mistress LFR) prove this is wrong.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy
